ðŸ“– Summary: Agent Zero is an AI framework for building dynamic, general-purpose personal assistants. It leverages the operating system as a tool, enabling the agent to write code and use the terminal to create custom tools. The framework also supports multi-agent cooperation, where agents can delegate tasks to subordinate agents.
